#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

bool vis[100010]={false};
vector<ll>a[100010];
 
ll bfs(ll i)
{
	ll ans=0;
	queue<ll>q;
	q.push(i);
	vis[i]=true;
	while(!q.empty())
	{
		ll x=q.front();
		q.pop();
		for(i=0;i<a[x].size();i++)
		{
			ll u=a[x][i];
			if(!vis[u])
			{
				vis[u]=true;
				ans++;
				q.push(u);
			}
		}
	}
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	ll n,i,n1,n2,c=0,arr[100001];
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>n1;
		cin>>n2;
		a[n1].push_back(n2);
		a[n2].push_back(n1);
	}
	ll k=0;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		if(!vis[i])
		{
			c++;
			ll val=bfs(i);
		    //cout<<val<<" ";
		    arr[k++]=val+1;
		}
	}
	//cout<<endl;
	cout<<c<<endl;
	sort(arr,arr+k);
	for(i=0;i<k;i++)
	cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
	cout<<endl;
}
